title: Field-Based Simulation Team Training for Enhancing Non-Technical Skills in Anesthesia Personnel

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental anesthesia techniques and teamwork experience
context.additional_context: Team-based learning emphasizing realism and practicality, with formative assessments evaluating field applicability post-simulation.

learning_goals: Learners can perform non-technical skills within anesthesia teams (communication, situational awareness, decision-making, stress management) with ≥80% accuracy through simulation training
Learners can apply ≥3 skills acquired from simulation to actual clinical settings to improve teamwork
Through team-based simulation training, learners can identify ≥2 deficiencies in their non-technical skills and develop improvement plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
